about_the_game:
Welcome to Skybase, a sandbox spaceship building and space exploration game.

Starting for a basic simple spaceship - enjoy exploring space, eliminate enemies you come across, and mine different metals and materials needed to fix or expand your ship.

Build any type of spaceship that you desire by simply spawning a ship core and adding various blocks to it in any way shape or form that you want.

Each block is crafted from different materials and metals that you mine around, with each one having different purposes assigned to them: Some are used as effective shielding to your spaceship, while others act as weapons or mining tools.

It is possible to attach several ships together to a single mothership that you control and explore with.

The goal in the game is to level up the player, expand your spaceship or spaceship fleet, take out enemy ships and take over ship freighters in the game.

Leveling up the player give the player option to upgrade his skills including: health, melee weapon power, ship module weapon power, mining effectiveness and more.

The more you progress and level up, the more powerful freighters, enemy ships and mobs you encounter.

You can take over freighters in various ways. For example:

  • You can blast the pilot controller with your ship, which can be challenging because the controller is protected the most with weapon modules.

  • You can land with your ship using a magnet module on the freighter and drill down into it.

  • You can use smaller ship opening to land your ship inside those opening and then handle various mob enemies until you get to the pilot controller.

    Exploring the ship freighter can be beneficial because of various materials that you can mine inside of it.

    Unique Items

  • Ship Core: Used to allocate a ship core.

  • Mining Tool: A tool that mines blocks x2 times faster than any other object.

  • Fix Hammer: Used for fixing a damaged block if the player has enough materials.

  • Level Up Tool: Used to level up unique blocks, making them more powerful.

  • Laser Weapon: - Melee weapon that shoots laser projectiles and a beam. Has Laser module version that can be added to a ship.

  • Chloro Shotgun: - Melee weapon that shoots shotgun bullets and a piercer beam. Has Chloro module that can be added to a ship.

  • Amethyst Gun: - Melee weapon that shoots rate fire projectiles and charger beam. Has Amethyst module version that can be added to a ship.

    The weapons and guns uses specific ammo ore that needs to be mined around.

  • Future developments

  • Procedural generated planets.

  • Online play.

Business mail: skybasegame@gmail.com

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5 @ 3.0 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card, RTX 2060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: For better performance: GPU should support OpenCL
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 @ 3.3 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card, GTX 2070 12 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: For better performance: GPU should support OpenCL
